item.description:
Mass Networking is back in Framingham BBC and will be on the 2nd Monday of the Month! (73 Attended 2/11 Event after Snow Storm and Could go Over 100 This Month)

Come Meet and Network with Other Professionals at our New Venue in Framingham! There might be over 100, this time!
Bring business cards, a smile, and a professional attitude because it's time to make some valuable new business contacts in 2013.
Dress code is business casual

(Appetizers, Plenty of Parking, and Free Raffle for Event Tickets plus More Giveaways to Win at Our Event)

[Over 100 Beers and 36 Drafts]

Advance Tickets Start at $5 and $10 Cash at the door if Available!
Get Tix Now: http://massnetworking0311.eventbrite.com

*Doing a Charity Raffle with chance to Win 2 tickets for Kelly Clarkson Concert on 5/2 in Boston and more!  Proceeds going to Sandy Hook and are $5/entry!  First 20 to Attend Event will get 1 Free Raffle Ticket!  Also, getting a group together to go see her!*

Raffles are Sponsored by www.BestNetShopping.com (Over 4000 Stores/Websites like Groupon, Sears, Pet Smart, Lowes, Home Depot, Angie's List and more with up to 50% Cash Back on Purchases) & www.Website-Business-Solutions.com (Up to 75% off on Top Notch Websites with E-Commerce and SEO) Check them out and Save!
item.name: 2nd Monday Framingham (80+ Expected)
